XHwIcap Struct Reference

#include <xhwicap.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The XHwIcap driver instance data. The user is required to allocate a variable of this type for every HwIcap device in the system. A pointer to a variable of this type is then passed to the driver API functions.
